page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: My particular thanks are due to Mr. and Mrs A. Grigor of West Chiltington. Their knowledge of the area dates back to the 1880s when Mrs Grigor's family, the Lerwills, first moved to Pallingham Manor Farm; the whole farmstock travelling by train from Devon to Billingshurst. Thanks are also due to:- Mr. and Mrs J.Parker of Toat Farm Mr.and Mrs L.Golden of Pallingham Mrs J. Burnford of Borough Farm Mrs A. Tyrell of Brinsbury College all of whom personally accompanied me round their farms. Finally,thanks to the staff of West Chiltington Primary School, especially to the Deputy Head, Mr.O Smith-Boyes. Without his help this information would not have reached or remained on the disc! D.Andrews, W.Chiltington Pres.Society
